verbs.description: [ARG0: AT&T Inc. ’s sweeping court victory] [V: allowing] [ARG1: its takeover of Time Warner Inc.] delivers a sharp setback to the Justice Department ’s new approach to policing mergers under President Donald Trump and promises to spark a merger wave across industries .
